name: The Fragrant Flower Blooms with Dignity
description: An up and coming popular  shoujo  with  multiple  awards to its name

name: ReLife
description: A slice of life that utilizes isekai elements to tell a heartwarming tale of redemption and improvement

name: Chainsaw Man
description: An  action   shonen  focused on Denji who takes on the role of the titular 'Chainsaw Man'

name: Sailor Moon
description: A girl running to school with toast in her mouth! A staple of the time, and an amazing  shoujo  that defined a generation

name: Blue Lock
description: A soccer  shonen  that is the antithesis of other sports  shonen . No power of friendship to be found here!

name: Horimiya
description: A  shonen  with reiwa energy oozing from the seams!  Romance  with conversation rather than a multitude of silly problems.

name: Akatsuki no Yona
description: Fantasy, Love, and  Action ! What more could you ask for! A woman out for redemption and a story with ample room for character development

name: Kuroko's Basketball
description: It's 'Sports'. Players with fantastical powers stretching the meaning of the sport

name: Bocchi the Rock
description: A sweethearted tale about a high school girl's struggle to find friends and the music that brings them together

name: Great Teacher Onizuka
description: A classic about a fish out of water teacher imparting unique life lessons on his students
